events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and want to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The system has categorized this issue as a refund request due to the customer's report of receiving an incorrect item.
Support agent Clara has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding the incorrect product delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m Clara and I’ll assist you with your refund claim for the item you didn’t receive.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund efficiently?
Here is my order number 789456123 and attached is the photo of the received product, which is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect item as a goodwill gesture.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. This solution works well for me, thank you very much.
Your refund has been processed successfully and you will see the amount refunded in your account within 3-5 business days.
We’re checking in to confirm that you have received the refund without any issues and to see if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team and have a great day!
